title: FS - 1912 Imperial Tobacco Joe Kelly HOF SGC
author: ccre

posts.post_title: FS - 1912 Imperial Tobacco Joe Kelly HOF SGC
posts.post_content: SOLD. Card looks great for an SGC 10.  It has a pencil mark right above Kelly and to the left of his name as well.  Otherwise it's in awesome condition.  $85 + $3.50 shipping. Paypal f/f or checks accepted.  Thanks for looking. Dave
